alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:26PM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 14 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
